TopicTitle: Wing Commander F-44 Rapier II for v1.0

Articles.Content:
After KSP 1.0 came out, I thought it was time to redesign the F-44 Rapier from Wing Commander. This is the WC1 version that flew for the TCS Tiger's Claw. Unfortunately, due to major changes in the aerodynamic system in KSP, these things can only fly in Kerbin...

![RSpPrhR.png](http://i.imgur.com/RSpPrhR.png)

![cUMfQBS.png](http://i.imgur.com/cUMfQBS.png)

![exX1yaL.png](http://i.imgur.com/exX1yaL.png)

![ZabnFH9.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZabnFH9.png)

Thank goodness for aerobrakes... and medium-sized landing gear...
